HGMS is an Android application embedded with a Gas analyzer. The system is developed for users to monitor leakage of harmful gases inside the cabin of an automobile. The most common gas causing intoxication and health imposed risks towards human beings in a running automobile is CO gas.

CO stands for carbon monoxide. Carbon monoxide is an odourless, tasteless, and it is not visible for the naked eye. Carbon monoxide poisoning commonly occurs from breathing in carbon monoxide at excessive levels. CO poisoning at excessive levels has statistically proven to induce health related risks towards human beings and it is proven to be fatal.

This mobile application allows users to monitor leakage of gases in the unit concentration of parts per million(PPM). The scope of gases detected from this device comprises of CO and other flammable gases.
